properties.address: Ramsey Mereside Village Hall, Drovers Close PE26 2UH
properties.description: Facilities: Accessible toilets, Accessible access in and out of the building, Fully accessible access throughout the building, Car park, Free wi-fi access, Available power sockets for people to use, Kitchen, Facilities to make hot food/ drink eg: kettle/ microwave, Secure building, Screen or television, Access to free activities eg: board games, jigsaws, drawing and colouring resources

properties.address: Yaxley Library, Landsdowne Road, Yaxley PE7 3JL
properties.description: Facilities: Car park - the nearest car park is opposite the library, behind the shopping centre, Public transport - bus stop 100 yards away (Stagecoach 5) or one mile away on London Road, near Folly Close (Stagecoach 904 Peterborough to St Ives), Accessibility - wheelchair-friendly. The mezzanine area is up 8 steps and not wheelchair accessible. , Computers - available to book, Free WiFi - you don't need a library card to use this service

properties.address: Yaxley Social Echo - Unit 6, Heron Court, Harrier Way, Eagle Business Park, Yaxley, PE7 3AT
properties.description: Facilities: Accessible toilets, Accessible access in and out of the building, Fully accessible access throughout the building (all public areas fully accessible), Car park (limited on-site parking), Free WiFi access, Available power sockets for people to use, Facilities to make hot food/drink (kettle/microwave), Secure building, Screen or television.
